Find the Nightsong

Requirements/Details:

Once you reach Nightsong at this location (X:-606 Y:-1435) in Nightsong's Prison, try to convince Shadowheart not to kill Nightsong. If you fail to persuade her, she will say that if she has to step over your corpse to fulfill Lady Shar's wishes, she will do it.
